tool.description: Identify gene co-expression network modules using WGCNA.

param.name: height_cut
param.label: Height
param.help: Refer to the sample clustering plot from WGCNA: preprocessing and choose a height cut that will remove outliers. If there is not outlier, leave this field blank.

param.name: expression_data
param.label: Gene expression data
param.help: Each row represents a gene and each column represents a sample.

param.name: trait_data
param.label: Trait data
param.help: If trait data is provided, a plot consisting of sample clustering and trait heatmap will be generated. This field is optional.

param.name: soft_threshold_power
param.label: Soft threshold power
param.help: Refer to the scale independence plot from 'WGCNA: construct network' and choose an optimal soft threshold power. An optimal power will be calculated automatically if no value is provided.

param.name: plot_genes
param.label: Number of genes
param.help: The number of genes that will be used. It is possible to speed up the plotting by providing a subset of genes. However, the gene dendrogram may ofter look different from dendrogram of all genes.

tool.help: This tool is a wrapper for the WGCNA R library. Please see the online WGCNA tutorial for further details.
